mdRecord.dcterms:isPartOf: Francis H. Pierpont Civil War Telegrams
mdRecord.dcterms:title: Leib, Charles to Pierpont, Francis H.
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Leib, Charles
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Gov Peirpoint [Francis H. Pierpont] Wheeling Sept 10 1861. By Telegram from Clarksburg 10 1861. Where were your blankets sent, during my absence at Washington five thousand were recd for me by Capt Chandler AQM & all save about fifteen hundred have been issued. none others have been recd since save horse blankets Chas Leib Capt & AQM 38D119pd
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Leib, Charles
Clarksburg, (West) Virginia
Wheeling, (West) Virginia
Pierpont, Francis H.
